mapper.insert: insert into tbl_vlan_allocations(id, device_id, vlan_id, allocated) values(#{id}, #{deviceId}, #{vlanId}, #{allocated})
mapper.select: select * from tbl_vlan_allocations where device_id = #{deviceId} and allocated = 1 order by vlan_id desc limit 1
select * from tbl_vlan_allocations where device_id = #{deviceId} and vlan_id = #{vlanId} and allocated = 1
select * from tbl_vlan_allocations where device_id = #{deviceId} and allocated = 0 limit 1
mapper.update: update tbl_vlan_allocations set allocated = 1 where id = #{id} and allocated = 0
update tbl_vlan_allocations set allocated = 0 where id = #{id} and allocated = 1
